entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 2.19

[shortdesc]

3M Cloth Belt 341D, 3 in x 24 in P120 X-weight, 50 per case

  • 3M Cloth Belt 341D is a durable aluminum oxide cloth belt recommended for your metal deburring, general metalworking, and some woodworking applications
  • It is suitable for wide belt, edge, or portable belt sanding, and can be used for a variety of applications on metal substrates and wood.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • X-weight cloth backing withstands heavy sanding and grinding
  • Resin bond withstands high heat and pressure
  • Tough aluminum oxide abrasive mineral cuts fast and performs well on many substrates
  • Bands fit onto a rubber expander wheel attachment (sold separately) for use with a die grinder or rotary drill

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 17.43

[shortdesc]

3M Trizact Cloth Belt 237AA, 2 in x 132 in A30 X-weight Fullflex, 50 per case

  • The 3Mâ„¢ Trizactâ„¢ Cloth Belt 237AA uses proprietary microreplication technology where micron-graded aluminum oxide particles are formed into tiny pyramids of abrasive mineral and then coated on an X-weight cloth backing
  • As these pyramids wear, fresh, sharp mineral is continually exposed to produce a consistent cut and a predictable, fine finish.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Self-sharpening pyramids start sharp, stay sharp, and run cooler than conventional abrasives
  • Flexible backing for consistent finish over contours
  • For intermediate finishing and fine polishing prior to plating or buffing
  • Ideal for intermediate finishing and fine polishing prior to plating or buffing
  • Produces finer finishes than conventional electrostatically coated abrasives

Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 13.28

[shortdesc]

3M Cubitron II Cloth Belt, 784F, film backing, 60+, YF-weight, 2 in x 132 in

  • 3Mâ„¢ Cubitronâ„¢ II Cloth Belt 784F features 3M Precision Shaped Ceramic Grain for longer life and a faster, more consistent cut than aluminum oxide belts
  • A precise mix of shaped ceramic and premium aluminum oxide delivers optimal cut in medium pressure grinding and blending applications
  • The sanding belt also features a waterproof backing and grinding aid.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • 3M Precision Shaped Grain blend provides up to 2x longer life than comparable aluminum oxide belts, which means a lower cost per part and less time lost to belt changeovers
  • Proprietary mineral blend provides consistent, faster results on medium pressure applications, increasing production rate
  • Moderately flexible backing provides conformability for grinding and blending both straight and contoured surfaces
  • For optimal durability and price value, YF weight polyester backing is used for Grades 36-80, while lighter XF weight polyester backing is used for Grades 120-180
  • Grinding aid cools abrasive processes on heat-sensitive alloys
  • Suitable for wet and dry applications on all metals

entry.title: 3M AM08910 - 3M Cubitron II Roloc Abrasive Disc 984F AM08910 7010308910
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 27.18

[shortdesc]

3M Cubitron II Roloc Abrasive Disc 984F

  • 3Mâ„¢ Cubitronâ„¢ II Cloth Belt 984F offers revolutionary performance with 3M Precision Shaped Ceramic Grain on a YF-weight polyester cloth backing
  • This high-performing sanding belt contains a grinding aid, making it ideal for medium to high-pressure applications on stainless steel and other alloys, along with carbon steel, cobalt chrome, and nickel alloys.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • To be used with back stand, bench top motors, centerless grinders, cylindrical grinders, disc sanders, edge sanders, file belt sanders, inline sanders, manual back stand, pressure assist back stand and wide belt sanders
  • 3M Precision Shaped Ceramic Grain continuously fractures into sharp points that cut exceptionally fast, helping increase productivity
  • Engineered to run cooler, reducing metal discolouration/oxidation and the chance of heat related stress cracks
  • 3M Precision-Shaped Ceramic Grain requires less pressure, which means less operator fatigue
  • Belt life is significantly longer, producing more parts per belt and requiring fewer belt changes
  • YF-weight backing excels in medium to high-pressure stainless steel, cobalt chrome and nickel alloy applications
    		•
